alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 9:40PM CST until December 15 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Lowndes and Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 940 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Mosses, Hayneville, Gordonville, Dannelly Field, Hope Hull, Pintlala, Woodcrest, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Snowdoun, Maxwell Air Force Base, Alabama State University, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Alabama State Capitol, Pinedale, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Gunter Air Force Base, Beechwood and Eastdale Mall.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
